title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-1.13 - Payment of maintenance charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-1.13 - Payment of maintenance charges

State Regulations

The director shall render bills at suitable intervals and a final bill as soon as practicable on discharge of the patient, to the person or agency in each instance who guaranteed payment, or, if payment is to be made from public funds, to the proper fiscal officer of the agency or the county or municipality indicated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
88-1.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
